mapper.select: SELECT pi.name as product_name, p.price, p.cost, p.exp, st.name as store_name ,s.qnt,s.sales_date FROM sales s INNER JOIN store_product sp on sp.id = s.store_product_id INNER JOIN product p on p.id = sp.product_id INNER JOIN product_info pi on pi.product_code = p.product_info_id INNER JOIN store st on st.id = sp.store_id WHERE store_id = #{store_id};
